entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@realDonaldTrump Seems to me the only person and party politicizing COVID-19 is you and the Republicans. People are dying and markets are crashing because you're an idiot who doesn't know what he's doing. I hope you're preparing yourself fo the fallout. It ain't gonna be pretty. 
#BlabberingYam
